Articles.Content:
Now I can officialy say:

There are more than 9000 THREADS ON THIS FORUM!!!

yay

there are also more than 20000 registered users :thumbup:

which puts the KSP community at the impressive mark of 2.26441553xO/F (ratio of user count in relation to the Orbiter forum) :cheers:

i think even harvester didn\'t really expect it to become THIS big - quite amazing, really... i was one of the first 10 users, seeing it grow like from back then is indeed vertiginous, to say the least :
What, were you expecting this not to happen?

btw - user number 20k is..... *drumroll*

piarre!

he has zero posts so far - and i think has not yet been made aware of his contribution in turning all those four nines into zeros for the second time

so here\'s to you, our 20000th user to join! :cheers:

may your number of launches be not too far higher than your number of safe landings! (however unlikely that is for kerbals) :hailprobe:

20000 users? Damn!

Being #26 I\'m kinda dumbstuck now; O-F has ~10000 over 4 years, and in 3/4 we\'ve got twice as much!

Well, congrats to pairre rounding our number, although 19991 is more interesting for being both a palindrome and a prime

I was just checking the memberlist and, apparently, Ascensiam was our very first member, joining in December 1969.

S:|

I was just checking the memberlist and, apparently, Ascensiam was our very first member, joining in December 1969.

S:|

Wow... Congrats to him.
just checked when i joined. 10210th person. lol. was playing kerbal since before i joined the forum

just checked when i joined. 10210th person. lol. was playing kerbal since before i joined the forum

How do you know that?
Apparently 170% of my posts are on RP...
